[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-shell](./foundation-shell.md) &gt; [AppMetadata](./foundation-shell.appmetadata.md)

## AppMetadata type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AppMetadata = {
    name: string;
    version: string;
    description?: string;
    dependencies?: AppDependencies;
    prerequisites?: AppDependencyPrerequisites;
};
```
**References:** [AppDependencies](./foundation-shell.appdependencies.md), [AppDependencyPrerequisites](./foundation-shell.appdependencyprerequisites.md)

## Remarks

It is not a hard requirement to have a `metadata.ts` file or a `AppMetadata` export token.

## Example

AppMetadata definition example.

```ts
// src/pbc/reporting/metadata.ts

export const metadata: AppMetadata = {
  name: '@genesiscommunitysuccess/pbc-reporting',
  description: 'Genesis Reporting PBC',
  version: '1.0.0',
  prerequisites: {
    '@genesislcap/foundation-ui': '14.0.0',
    gsf: '7.1.0-SNAPSHOT',
  },
  dependencies: {
    '@genesislcap/pbc-reporting': '1.0.0',
    serverDepId: '7.1.0-SNAPSHOT',
  },
};
```
